enhanced_by.reason: Both methods use a similar set of optional parameters like 'asset', 'current', 'size', and 'recvWindow'.
Both methods involve querying the state of flexible products, which can be used to set up the initial state for the preview method.
The output of flexibleSubscriptionPreview can be compared with the historical subscription records to validate the correctness of the preview.
The preview method's output can be verified against the personal left quota to ensure the subscription amount is within the allowed limits.
